trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a database.
trans-unit.target: 表示要對資料庫執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此類型已被取代，並將在未來的.NET Framework 版本中移除。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>類別會提供對資料來源執行命令的下列方法：

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Executes commands that return rows.
trans-unit.target: 執行傳回資料列的命令。

trans-unit.source: Executes an SQL statement against the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A> and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A> 執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令，例如 SQL INSERT、 DELETE、 UPDATE 和 SET 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as a .NET Framework data type.
trans-unit.target: 從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值），做為.NET Framework 資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as an Oracle-specific data type.
trans-unit.target: 從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值），做為特定的 Oracle 資料類型。

trans-unit.source: You can reset the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property and reuse the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重設<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性和重複使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: If execution of the command results in a fatal <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> may close.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行此命令會導致嚴重<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>可能會關閉。

trans-unit.source: However, the user can reopen the connection and continue.
trans-unit.target: 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the **Command** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不同於**命令**物件中的其他.NET Framework 資料提供者 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC）<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>物件不支援<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting a command timeout has no effect and the value returned is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 設定命令逾時有任何作用，傳回的值也永遠是零。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, along with <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>, to select rows from a table.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>，連同<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>、 從資料表選取資料列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The base constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 基底建構函式所有的欄位初始化成為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>。

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: empty string ("")
trans-unit.target: 空字串 ("")

trans-unit.source: null
trans-unit.target: null

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: The text of the query.
trans-unit.target: 查詢的文字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> class with the text of the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用查詢的文字，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The text of the query.
trans-unit.target: 查詢的文字。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> object that represents the connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 物件，表示與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> class with the text of the query and an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用查詢文字和 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 物件來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>。

trans-unit.source: The text of the query.
trans-unit.target: 查詢的文字。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> object that represents the connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 物件，表示與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" /> in which the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 執行的所在 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> class with the text of the query, an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> object, and an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用查詢文字、<see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 物件和 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of this implementation of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這項實作的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>。

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> that is the value for the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>也就是值`connection`參數。

trans-unit.source: You can change the value for any of these parameters by setting the related property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更任何這些參數的值設定相關的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to cancel the execution of an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取消 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 的執行。

trans-unit.source: If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有要取消項目，會發生任何事。

trans-unit.source: However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, executes it, then cancels the execution.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>、 加以執行，然後取消執行。

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成這項作業，方法會傳遞是 SQL SELECT 陳述式的字串，並連接到資料庫所用的字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object in which all property values are the same as the original.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 物件，其中所有屬性值都與原始值相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the database.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要針對資料庫執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可能需要使用逸出字元語法，如果預存程序名稱包含任何特殊字元。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫其中一個執行方法時，命令會執行這個預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式所呼叫的.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 當使用具名參數的 SQL 陳述式中呼叫<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`，您必須在參數名稱，以冒號 （:）。

trans-unit.source: However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 不過，在預存程序，或您的程式碼中的其他位置的具名參數 (例如，當加入<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>物件加入至<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A>屬性)，不會在之前使用冒號 （:），為具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 都會自動提供冒號。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定結束執行命令的嘗試並產生錯誤之前的等待時間。

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentException> is generated if the assigned <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> property value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArgumentException>如果就會產生受指派<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>屬性值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> property is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示如何解譯 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Text" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Text" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property to the full Oracle call syntax.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>完整的 Oracle call 語法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 命令再執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫其中一種 Execute 方法 (例如，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>無法設定屬性，如果目前的連接正在執行 execute 或擷取作業。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式所呼叫的.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 當使用具名參數的 SQL 陳述式中呼叫<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`，您必須在參數名稱，以冒號 （:）。

trans-unit.source: However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 不過，在預存程序，或您的程式碼中的其他位置的具名參數 (例如，當加入<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>物件加入至<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A>屬性)，不會在之前使用冒號 （:），為具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 都會自動提供冒號。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of a derived class <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立衍生類別的執行個體<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: The value was not a valid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> used by this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 的這個執行個體所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: The connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源的連接。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null value.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 Null 值。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation.
trans-unit.target: 您不能設定<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>如果目前的連接正在執行 execute 或提取作業的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A> while a transaction is in progress and the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> property is not null, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果在交易進行時設定 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>，且 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> 屬性不是 null，則會產生 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A> after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> property is not null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> property is then set to a null value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>交易已經認可或回復之後和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>屬性不是 null，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>屬性設為 null 的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>並設定其屬性的某些。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> property was changed while a transaction was in progress.
trans-unit.target: 當交易正在進行中時，<see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> 屬性會變更。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter" /> 物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CreateParameter%2A> method is a strongly-typed version of <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CreateParameter%2A>方法是強類型版本的<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command object should be visible in a customized interface control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出命令物件是否應該在自訂介面控制項中顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the command object should be visible in a control; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令物件應該在控制項中顯示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Executes an SQL statement against the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> 執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 對於 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 陳述式，傳回值為 0。

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表）; 或若要變更的資料在資料庫中，而不使用<xref:System.Data.DataSet>、 藉由執行更新、 插入或刪除陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>不傳回任何資料列、 任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會以資料填入。

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 對於 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 陳述式，傳回值為 0。

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。

trans-unit.source: If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要進行復原，傳回值也是-1。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and then executes it by using <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>，然後使用執行<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement (such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE) and a string to use to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會傳遞 （例如 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE） 的 SQL 陳述式的字串，並要用來連接到資料庫的字串。

trans-unit.source: The connection does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 連接不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: 連接未開啟。

trans-unit.source: A base64 string representation of the actual row ID in the server.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器中實際資料列 ID 的 Base64 字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Executes an SQL statement against the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> and returns the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> 執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 對於 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 陳述式，傳回值為 0。

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A> to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A>來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表）; 或若要變更的資料在資料庫中，而不使用<xref:System.Data.DataSet>、 藉由執行更新、 插入或刪除陳述式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A> differs from <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> in that it returns `rowid` as an output parameter if you are executing an INSERT, DELETE, or UPDATE statement that affects exactly one row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A> 不同於<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>，會傳回`rowid`做為輸出參數，如果執行會影響只有一個資料列的 INSERT、 DELETE 或 UPDATE 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to uniquely identify a row in the Oracle database, which can allow you to increase performance in subsequent, related queries.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您用來唯一識別 Oracle 資料庫時，可讓您以提升效能，在後續的相關查詢中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A> does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleNonQuery%2A>不傳回任何資料列、 任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會以資料填入。

trans-unit.source: The connection does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 連接不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: 連接未開啟。

trans-unit.source: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as an Oracle-specific data type.
trans-unit.target: 執行查詢，並傳回查詢當做 Oracle 特定資料型別所傳回的結果集中第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: Extra columns or rows are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 額外的資料行或資料列都會遭到忽略。

trans-unit.source: The first column of the first row in the result set as an Oracle-specific data type, or a null reference if the result is a <see langword="REF CURSOR" />.
trans-unit.target: 做為 Oracle 特定資料型別之結果集第一個資料列的第一個資料行；而如果結果是 <see langword="REF CURSOR" />，則為 Null 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleScalar%2A> method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleScalar%2A>方法來從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。

trans-unit.source: This requires less code than using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: 這需要較少的程式碼比使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>方法，這個方法，然後執行 產生單一值從傳回的資料所需的作業<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>。

trans-unit.source: A typical <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleScalar%2A> query can be formatted as in the following C# example:
trans-unit.target: 一般<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteOracleScalar%2A>查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> and builds an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳送 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> 至 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" />，並建置 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> and builds an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳送 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> 至 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" />，並建置 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The command then executes this stored procedure when you call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 命令再執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: More than one <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> can be open at any given time.
trans-unit.target: 多個<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>可以開啟任何給定的時間。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>，然後執行它，藉由傳遞字串是 SQL SELECT 陳述式和用來連接到資料來源的字串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" />, and builds an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" /> using one of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 傳送 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText" /> 至 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" />，並使用其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值來建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior> value may improve application performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果您預期您的 SQL 陳述式會傳回單一資料列，則指定`SingleRow`為<xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>值可能會改善應用程式的效能。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The command then executes this stored procedure when you call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 命令再執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>支援特殊模式可以讓您有效率地讀取大型二進位值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`SequentialAccess`設定<xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>。

trans-unit.source: More than one <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> can be open at any given time.
trans-unit.target: 多個<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>可以開啟任何給定的時間。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>, and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>，然後藉由傳遞字串，是 SQL SELECT 陳述式和字串，用來連接到資料庫中執行它。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior> is then set to <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior.CloseConnection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior> 然後將設定為<xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior.CloseConnection>。

trans-unit.source: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as a .NET Framework data type.
trans-unit.target: 執行查詢，並傳回查詢當做 .NET Framework 資料型別所傳回的結果集 (Result Set) 第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: Extra columns or rows are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 額外的資料行或資料列都會遭到忽略。

trans-unit.source: The first column of the first row in the result set as a .NET Framework data type, or a null reference if the result set is empty or the result is a <see langword="REF CURSOR" />.
trans-unit.target: 做為 .NET Framework 資料型別之結果集第一個資料列的第一個資料行；而如果結果集是空的或結果是 <see langword="REF CURSOR" />，則為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A> method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>方法來從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。

trans-unit.source: This requires less code than using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: 這需要較少的程式碼比使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>方法，這個方法，然後執行 產生單一值從傳回的資料所需的作業<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>。

trans-unit.source: A typical <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A> query can be formatted as in the following C# example:
trans-unit.target: 一般<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and then executes it using <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>，然後執行它使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會傳遞是彙總的結果，傳回 SQL 陳述式的字串，並要用來連接到資料庫的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: SQL 陳述式或預存程序的參數。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> property should be set to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>屬性應該設定為預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可能需要使用逸出字元語法，如果預存程序名稱包含任何特殊字元。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫其中一個執行方法時，命令會執行這個預存程序。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式所呼叫的.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 不支援問號 （？） 預留位置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須使用具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 當使用具名參數的 SQL 陳述式中呼叫<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`，您必須在參數名稱，以冒號 （:）。

trans-unit.source: However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 不過，在預存程序，或您的程式碼中的其他位置的具名參數 (例如，當加入<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>物件加入至<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A>屬性)，不會在之前使用冒號 （:），為具名的參數。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 都會自動提供冒號。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and displays its parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>並顯示它的參數。

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the method is passed an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and an array of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成這項作業，方法會傳遞<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>，是 SQL SELECT 陳述式和陣列的查詢字串<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在資料來源上建立命令的準備好的 (或已編譯的) 版本。

trans-unit.source: Before you call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Prepare%2A>, specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared.
trans-unit.target: 之前先呼叫<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Prepare%2A>，先備妥的陳述式中指定的每個參數的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> is not set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> 未設定。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> is not <see cref="M:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection" /> 不是 <see cref="M:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Open" />。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout" /> property to the default value.
trans-unit.target: 重設 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout" /> 屬性為預設值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" /> within which the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> executes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其中執行 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null value.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 Null 值。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing.
trans-unit.target: 您不能設定<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>屬性，如果它已設定為特定值，而且命令正在執行。

trans-unit.source: If you set the transaction property to an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction> object that is not connected to the same <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> as the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object, an exception will be thrown the next time you attempt to execute a statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定交易屬性<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction>未連線到相同的物件<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>為<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>物件時，會擲回例外狀況，下次您嘗試執行陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the <see langword="Update" /> method should apply command results to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，指定 <see langword="Update" /> 應該如何將命令結果套用到 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource> value is `Both` unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>), in which case the default is `None`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>值是`Both`除非命令會自動產生 (如果是做為<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>)，預設值是在此情況下`None`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource> property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用<xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>屬性，請參閱[DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value entered was not one of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> 值。
